name: Zamazenta
description: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master’s Shield. It was feared and respected by all.

attacks.name: Metal Armament
attacks.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Amazing Shield
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon VMAX.
